name: Ship Control
description:
This is intended to be a game about building and managing your very own ship. Each ship module is a separate object with it's own health, energy, resistances and functions. Your ship design matters. Since all ships are physics driven, positions of engines, armor and any other module greatly affects maneuverability of your ship. Cannons blocked by other ship parts will not shoot. Performance of most types of guns, shields and other modules depends on energy you give to them and this can decide the end of battle.

Multiplayer is already working for windows and linux builds.

Currently there is no textures, plenty of bugs, non-implemented functions, music, sound and particle effects are only placeholders.

Web build is the most bugged one, dated and will always be.

Experimental builds contain the most interesting and newest bugs. See changelog.

If you still think it makes any sense, you are welcome to join discord channel https://discord.gg/vnKuttj
